title: `hg file -d` won't delete files which are no longer marked modified in the repo
body:
by **kevin+google@sb.org**: 
`hg file -d` filters the list of files given to it to only consist of files that are
modified in the repo. It 
does this before intersecting that with the list of files in the CL. Unfortunately, this
means that 
there is no way to remove a file from a CL if that file is marked as unmodified in the
current repo.

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
d9b2e68a1bd2+ tip
